description: Soul weapon emblem grid layouts for Slayer Legend. Each weapon has a unique grid pattern that determines where emblems can be placed.

_metadata.extractionSource: In-game screenshots from research/screenshots/sw-grids/ and Korean wiki (https://en.namu.wiki)
_metadata.notes: Grid layouts extracted from game UI screenshots (IDs 13-54). Completion effects updated from Korean wiki. IDs 1-12 do not have grids (pre-stage 320). IDs 55-81 are placeholders awaiting grid layout data - completion effects are accurate from wiki.
